scripts.test: cd tests && webpack && cd .. && node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/test*
scripts.coverage: cd tests && webpack && cd .. && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- tests/test*
scripts.coveralls: cd tests && webpack && cd .. && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- tests/test* && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -fr ./coverage
